title: [LFT] Gold+ Team.
body:
Well to start off, I duo with a lot of different people played for really high elo teams and the thing was, they didn't expect me to play so well. But I did, which was unexpected for them, I don't throw games a lot

I've duo'd with a diamond and I've carried him and beat various diamond/platinum/gold bot lanes.
The thing is I'm only silver 5, I don't know who to duo with because most of them aren't very good. 

But I'm looking to join a ranked team. I know you'll think it's stupid , I'm not like that, I know a lot about league, it's just everytime I carry an adc, the rest of team feeds, I try to roam, but then they pick off my adc when I specifically say can you play safe under tower? They play aggressive under tower then die and blame me.

I would just like to prove myself, thanks

- Jules aka skillasaurusx

No hate :)
Also please don't spam or write you will never find a team etc. It doesn't make me happy :P

replies.body: Hey add me on League and ill talk to you
